page.title: 02HOUSING IN FORTON 2
page.content: The roads branching off Troutbeck Avenue are Lakeland Close and Ennerdale Close.The one branching off Lunesdale Drive is Ribblesdale Drive.Most of the houses in the actual village are very nice and modern,but in fact the village is very old. The oldest buildings are the farms which go back as far as the 17th century but most of them date from the 18th. These farms are scattered around Forton but the oldest houses are concentrated on Hollins Lane(formerly the main trunk road before the A.6), Wallace lane and Cockerham Road.
